Articles.Content:
A quick howdy here to all.

One simple question, I must have missed the PDF file somewhere for the Manual for KSP? I see no manual anywhere. Saddens me as this KSP looks promising and my wife bought it for me for fathers day. Hate to see good money go to waste due to lack of a manual.

T
Not much written documentation I'm afraid but there are plenty of great youtube tutorials, here's one of many:

here's one of many:

You mean, "here's one of manley:"

You can also try this page for tutorials: https://www.kerbalspaceprogram.com/tutorials.php

and here are the controls for the game on the KSP wiki: http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Key_Bindings

Not much written documentation I'm afraid but there are plenty of great youtube tutorials, here's one of many:

Thanks, but I've watched that one, plus some others. However I am on Limited bandwidth with my satellite provider. Video's eat up the bandwidth I'm afraid. At least I've made it to orbit a couple of time in rickity ships. Duct tape and chewing gum held them together.

T

With the game still in development, things like manuals and in-game tutorials will be limited. Those are usually some of the last things you do so you don't spend a lot of time rewriting them at each update.

As most have said, videos are the best bet but aren't suitable for you due to your connection. This gives me an idea. I'll see about getting some basic imagery and text posted that would help those in similar situations.

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

[b']Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

That would help immensely with newbies starting out. Thank you in advance. (Could you send me a PM with links when you get some of those made?)

T
